parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Quo libero minus.","description":"Repellendus animi rerum. Consequuntur voluptatem autem. Ad sint inventore. Alias dolores distinctio. Et sed hic.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-14","end_at":"2019-02-16","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Quo libero minus.","description":"Repellendus animi rerum. Consequuntur voluptatem autem. Ad sint inventore. Alias dolores distinctio. Et sed hic.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-14","end_at":"2019-02-16","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 0ab8ebd4d17f2de15a62029e834cb44a7587e0bc82f6630e6cd109d60d98a69c" \
